com.jonfreer.wedding.infrastructure.unitofwork

Class DatabaseUnitOfWork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jonfreer.wedding.infrastructure.unitofwork.DatabaseUnitOfWork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatabaseUnitOfWork, IUnitOfWork

    public class DatabaseUnitOfWork
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDatabaseUnitOfWork
    Represents a unit of work in the context of database interactions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseUnitOfWork(java.sql.Connection connection)
      Constructs a new instance provided an instance of Connection.

    • Method Summary

      Constructs an instance of PreparedStatement in the context of this unit of work.
      void Save()
      Saves (commits) the unit of work to the database.
      void Undo()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseUnitOfWork

        public DatabaseUnitOfWork(java.sql.Connection connection)
        Constructs a new instance provided an instance of Connection. It is in the context of this connection that the unit of work will be utilized. It is recommended that an instance of this class is created by using the DatabaseUnitOfWorkFactory class as opposed to invoking this constructor directly.
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection that this DatabaseUnitOfWork instance will be used with.

    • Method Detail

      • Save

        public void Save()
        Saves (commits) the unit of work to the database.
        Specified by:
        Save in interface IUnitOfWork

      • Undo

        public void Undo()
        Undoes (performs a rollback for) the unit of work.
        Specified by:
        Undo in interface IUnitOfWork

      • createPreparedStatement

        public java.sql.PreparedStatement createPreparedStatement(java.lang.String sql)
        Constructs an instance of PreparedStatement in the context of this unit of work. Use this method to add changes to the unit of work.
        Specified by:
        createPreparedStatement in interface IDatabaseUnitOfWork
        Parameters:
        sql - The parameterized SQL to execute during this unit of work.
        Returns:
        An instance of PreparedStatement representing a single parameterized SQL statement to execute for this unit of work.
